dcterms:creator: Yo Matsumoto
dcterms:description: This paper discusses the semantic structures and system of Japanese classifiers, providing insights into their lexical structures and the requirements for their use.
dcterms:title: Matsumoto (1991) - The Semantic Structures and System of Japanese Classifiers

dcterms:creator: Yo Matsumoto
dcterms:description: This paper provides a study on Japanese numeral classifiers, focusing on their lexical structures and the constraints on their use.
dcterms:title: Matsumoto (1993) - Japanese Numeral Classifiers: A Study on Lexical Semantic Categories

dcterms:creator: Asako Iida
dcterms:description: This paper discusses the semantic restrictions of Japanese classifiers, providing insights into their usage and the constraints on their application.
dcterms:title: Iida (1999) - Nihongo Shuyoo-josuushi-no Imi-to Yoohoo

dcterms:creator: Taro Kageyama
Miho Mano
Yu Yonezawa
Takayuki Tohno
dcterms:description: This paper presents a categorization of Japanese counters into numeral classifiers and measure specifiers, providing insights into their functions and applications.
dcterms:title: Kageyama et al. (2011) - Meishi-no Seishitsu-to Kazoekata

dcterms:creator: Asako Iida
dcterms:description: This paper discusses the Kazoekata dictionary, providing a comprehensive resource for understanding Japanese classifiers and their usage.
dcterms:title: Iida (2004) - Kazoekata-no Jiten

dcterms:creator: Chu-Ren Huang
Kathleen Ahrens
dcterms:description: This paper discusses the coercive mechanisms in the Mandarin classifier system, providing insights into the semantic types of classifiers.
dcterms:title: Huang and Ahrens (2003) - Individuals, Kinds and Events: Classifier Coercion of Nouns

dcterms:creator: Yo Matsumoto
dcterms:description: This paper discusses the semantic structures and system of Japanese classifiers, providing insights into their lexical structures and the requirements for their use.
dcterms:title: Matsumoto (1991) - The Semantic Structures and System of Japanese Classifiers

dcterms:creator: Pamela A Downing
dcterms:description: This paper discusses the numeral classifier systems in Japanese, providing insights into their lexical structures and applications.
dcterms:title: Downing (1996) - Numeral Classifier Systems: The Case of Japanese
